data.name: DiscountError
data.value: The value cannot be more than 100 percent!

data.name: JustifChooseCpFAQ
data.value:
Indicate the rationale for choosing a supplier, comparison of cost and functional description with similar services on the market, previous similar purchases. Advantages of the supplier, what are the losses in terms of time and money if you don’t buy now from the chosen supplier. The existence of previously concluded contracts and their amounts with this supplier is also indicated.
Example 1: Due to the fact that ______ is the exclusive supplier of _________, and the implementation of the project requirements is based on the already developed __________ application architecture, design solutions, basic technologies for loading and visualizing data, it is necessary to involve the __________ company _____________ in the implementation of new functionality. In connection with the above, it is not possible to select another counterparty.
Example 2: Due to the fact that ______ provided the best price offer at our request, and also taking into account the implementation of the entire scope of the technical specifications, we propose that the procurement commission agree on the conclusion of a contract with _________.

data.name: AmountError
data.value: The sum of the costs of the stages from the table in paragraph 1.4 does not coincide with the purchase amount!

data.name: SpecificcationFAQ
